amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to assist the States in carrying out drought prevention plans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 380 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 380 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text as modified: CR 3/26/2015 S2016) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to assist the States in carrying out drought prevention plans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 380 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 380 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Inhofe.
